name: Kaflydoscope
description:
For Weekly Game Jam 112, which had the theme 'color the world'. Submission was 8.5 hours late due to exporting issues and struggles with small features (removing projectiles better).

Gameplay reflections:

  • Balance could be improved. Staying on one colour shouldn't be effective, but it is. The projectile speeds and movement speeds also need tweaking - I found myself chasing projectiles quite often.
  • The player should see their score after they lose.
  • Feedback for healing, deflecting and taking damage should be clearer.

Last updated ~11:30am 06/09/2019 AEST.
